titles: William Penn's Ansvver to John Faldo's printed Challenge
author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
notes: Dated at end: London the 12th of the 8th month, 1674.
A reply to an anti-Quaker tract.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
